Over the years we have partnered with
institutions from several industries and
niches to deliver a better life.
Some of these partnerships have been forged to deliver
CSR projects, provide scholarship opportunities to thousands of Africans,
mentorship, collaboration, and job opportunities to our students and alumni.

Explore our network of trusted
partners and collaborations that enable us to provide our students with the best digital and tech education and resources

Looking for a dynamic and innovative partner to help take your business to the next level? Look no further. We take pride in our collaborative approach, working side by side with companies of all sizes to see opportunities, overcome obstacles, and realize their objectives.  Based on 150 reviews 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Salaudeen Odunayo 
 
2023-07-22
 
 
  
It was a great experience training with Premium. The lectures are top-notch and serious-minded. I enjoyed every bit of the training in digital marketing graphic designing and  website development
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Opeyemi Oreofeoluwa 
 
2023-07-22
 
 
  
PDMA  is definitely the right place to be. In terms of Digital Marketing training, they are the best in what they do. Their tutoring and mentorship are top notch, and the tutors are very welcoming, I had a wonderful experience with them and i look forward to recommend more potential students to PDMA.
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Abdullahi Korede 
 
2023-07-22
 
 
  
The digital marketing training at PDMA is one of the best digital training experience have ever had.
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Chidimma Echenim 
 
2023-07-22
 
 
  
I am a beneficiary of one of the digital marketing scholarship trainings.I must confess i learnt a lot that has helped me to grow my business development Agency and offer better services to my clients.
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 aboaba eniola 
 
2023-06-21
 
 
  
I had the best training in The Digital Marketing Course I took recently with PDMA. It was Enlightening, Educating and worth it. Great Facilitators and nice learning environment. Thumbs Up
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Chinyere Eziokwu 
 
2023-06-21
 
 
  
Digital marketing training is one of the best training I have had. The instructors were very keen and very well explanatory. The class  practical and assignment were very educative and eye opening. I really learnt a lot in graphic design and content writing which I never knew I could do. I recommend the academy  100 percent
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 global queen 
 
2023-06-21
 
 
  
PDMA SEO training is very simplified and well explained.
it is a unique experience
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Anuoluwapo Orukotan 
 
2023-06-21
 
 
  
This is definitely the best digital marketing training center in Lagos!! Great coaches. Wonderful experience during my time here
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Chinenye John 
 
2023-05-25
 
 
  
I joined PDMA as a novice in anything digital, but now I can say  that the social media marketing training has been very educating  and enlightening that I'm no longer a novice. Thanks  to PDMA
  
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Toyo Toye 
 
2023-05-25
 
 
  
PDMA is the best digital marketing academy in Nigeria. i had a great experience and the instructors were super amazing.
